Package entity

Class Showtime

java.lang.Object
entity.Showtime
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Showtime extends Object implements Serializable
Author:
Cross Showtime class is a specific movie at a specific cinema and time with its seat layout

      cinemaCode - the cinemaCode of the Showtime
      movie - the Movie of the Showtime
      dateTime - date and time of the Showtime
      seatLayout - the seatLayout of the Showtime

    • isWeekend

      public boolean isWeekend()
      checks if this Showtime is on a weekend i.e. Fri 6pm to Sun
      Returns:
      true if its Fri 6pm to Sun, else return false
